snippet.title: GrowRilla - Early Access VR - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
You can wishlist and buy the game here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/981880/GrowRilla/?utm_source=yt
Releasing on September 12th!

You're a small gorilla, equipped with the incredible ability to grow by eating. A stealthy survival game that quickly evolves into an intense battle as you grow into an oversized monster. 

Visit the official GrowRilla Homepage for more info: http://growrillagame.com/
Or visit our website to learn more about our studio: http://salmi.de/

Thank you for supporting an indie studio trying to make unique VR experiences, we appreciate it.
